title: On receipt of an application under Clause (i) above, the Collector shall grant the Letter of Intent
clause_text: On receipt of an application under Clause (i) above, the Collector shall grant the Letter of Intent for the whole area or separately for any part thereof, which shall not be less than
section: Letter of Intent (LOI) by the Collector :-
